Package io.atomix.protocols.raft.cluster

Provides interfaces for managing and interacting with the Raft cluster.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RaftCluster
    Raft server cluster API.
    RaftClusterEventListener
    Raft cluster event listener.
    RaftMember
    Represents a member of a Raft cluster.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RaftClusterEvent
    Raft cluster event.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RaftClusterEvent.Type
    Raft cluster event type.
    RaftMember.Type
    Indicates how the member participates in voting and replication.

Package io.atomix.protocols.raft.cluster Description

Provides interfaces for managing and interacting with the Raft cluster.
